name: Darkwood Forest
description: A dense forest where shadows seem to move of their own accord. Local hunters avoid certain parts of these woods.

locations.name: Bandit Camp
locations.description: A hidden encampment carefully concealed among the trees.

buildings.name: Leader's Tent
buildings.description: A large tent decorated with strange symbols.

locations.name: Ancient Ruins
locations.description: Crumbling stone structures covered in mysterious runes.

buildings.name: Underground Chamber
buildings.description: A hidden chamber beneath the ruins where dark rituals take place.
